column4: Im trying to download a game that only has downloads for linux generic or debian. I know its debian I should choose, but then it asks me for etch or lenny? Im not sure what to select If I run ubunut...
i believe etch is the stable debian release
i might be wrong, -- either should work though
Flannel: okay thanks. Ill try lenny, if it doesnt work ill just compile it from source.
